title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
OB: When creating a new package in the Java Project Wizard, the message displayed is confusing and unclear.
EB: The message displayed in the New Package Wizard should provide clear instructions and guidance on creating a new package in a Java project.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new Java Project.
2. Select the created project.
3. Access the New Package Wizard.
